Five Guys Burgers&Fries grew from a family owned fast food restaurant in Arlington , Virginia to becoming a franchise in 2001 . The original "Five Guys" included Janie and Jerry Murrell and their four sons who began their first restaurant in 1986 . Five Guys also prides themselves in using zero artificial trans fat in their foods, 38,409,200 lbs. of potatoes were used in their stores in 2008 , and over 250,000 burgers are sold daily at their restaurants. http://www.fiveguys.com/home.aspx Since 1999, the burgers at Five Guys have been voted #1 in the Washingtonian Magazine's "Readers' Choice", and ZAGAT has been rating the food at Five Guys since 2001.
Five Guys offers hamburgers mainly, but also serve kosher-style hot dogs , and other sandwiches, along with fresh-cut French fries served boardwalk-style and fried in pure peanut oil . Patrons are allowed to add additional toppings to their food including mayo, relish, onion, lettuce, pickle, tomato, green pepper, jalapeno, grilled onion and grilled mushrooms. Sauces that can be added to an order include: BBQ, Hot sauce and A-1 . There are over 450 locations across 30 states as of October , 2009 . On this page, you will learn all the information you'll need to know about where to buy gift cards for Five Guys restaurants, and how to use them.
Online Ordering
In 2010 , Five Guys began a new online ordering program for select locations. More locations to be added at later times. You can use the Five Guys store locator to find the nearest location to you here: http://www.fiveguys.com/locations.aspx
Present locations include:
Northern Virginia Chicago, IL Atlanta, GA North Carolina Pennsylvania Jacksonville, FL Salt Lake City, UT Texas Washington D.C. Oregon
http://www.fiveguys.com/orderonline.aspx
About Five Guys Burgers And Fries Gift Cards
Five Guys offers gift cards in denominations of $10, $20, $40, $60, and $80 which can be purchased through their online store or at any Five Guys restaurant. They are redeemable at all Five Guys locations.
Gift cards from Five Guys cannot be used to purchase products in their online store, nor are redeemable for cash.
Exchanges or returns are not permitted for this item either. http://fiveguys.shop.musictoday.com/Dept.aspx?cp=1230_14869
